children_exceptions.name: Belgium: entry rules for children
children_exceptions.conditions: Travellers under 6 years of age do not need to present a Covid test result on entry.

children_exceptions.name: Belgium: local rules for children
children_exceptions.conditions: The regulations in which situations and from what age mouth and nose coverings or other masks are mandatory for children may differ depending on the  federal state.

children_exceptions.name: Luxembourg: entry rules for children
children_exceptions.conditions: Children younger than 6 years old travelling to Luxembourg by air do not need to make a Covid test to enter the country.

children_exceptions.name: Luxembourg: local rules for children
children_exceptions.conditions: Children under 6 years old are not required to wear masks in public spaces.

children_exceptions.name: Netherlands: entry rules for children
children_exceptions.conditions: Childeren younger than 13 years of age do not need to present negative Covid test results on entry.

entry_regulations.name: No restrictions
entry_regulations.conditions: No special special requirements upon entry apply.

entry_regulations.name: 3G/TGV (PCR or antigen test)
entry_regulations.conditions: Present a negative rapid antigen or PCR covid test result, a recovery certificate or a vaccination certificate.

entry_regulations.name: 3G/TGV (PCR test)
entry_regulations.conditions: Present a negative PCR covid test result, a recovery certificate or a vaccination certificate.

entry_regulations.name: Health declaration (NL)
entry_regulations.conditions: You need to fill out a health declaration before boarding. You can find the digital version at: https://www.government.nl/topics/coronavirus-covid-19/documents/publications/2020/07/07/information-for-passengers-flying-to-and-from-the-netherlands.

entry_regulations.name: Health declaration AND 3G/TGV (NL)
entry_regulations.conditions: Present a negative rapid antigen or PCR covid test result, a recovery certificate or a vaccination certificate. You need to fill out a health declaration before boarding. You can find the digital version at: https://www.government.nl/topics/coronavirus-covid-19/documents/publications/2020/07/07/information-for-passengers-flying-to-and-from-the-netherlands.

entry_regulations.name: Passenger Locator Form (BE)
entry_regulations.conditions: You must fill out a Passenger Locator Form within 48 hours before arrival.

entry_regulations.name: Passenger Locator Form AND 3G/TGV (BE)
entry_regulations.conditions: Present a negative PCR test result, a recovery certificate or a vaccination certificate. You must fill out a Passenger Locator Form within 48 hours before arrival.

vaccine_regulations.name: Belgium, vaccination validity
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Proof of vaccination is valid: on the 14th day after the full vaccination or the 1st out of 2 doses in case of recovery within 6 months of an infection.

vaccine_regulations.name: Belgium, approved vaccines
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Accepted vaccines: Pfizer / Moderna / AstraZeneca / Janssen

vaccine_regulations.name: Luxembourg, vaccination validity
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Proof of vaccination is valid: in case of 2 doses from the day of the 2nd dose; on the 14th day after the vaccination in case of 1 dose or the 1st out of 2 doses in case of recovery within 6 months of an infection.

vaccine_regulations.name: Luxembourg, approved vaccines
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Accepted vaccines: Pfizer / Moderna / AstraZeneca / Janssen

vaccine_regulations.name: Netherlands, vaccination validity
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Proof of vaccination is valid: on the 14th day after full vaccination; on the 28th day in case of vaccination with Janssen.

vaccine_regulations.name: Netherlands, approved vaccines
vaccine_regulations.conditions: Accepted vaccines: Pfizer / Moderna / AstraZeneca / Janssen / Covishield / Sinopharm BIBP / Sinovac

local_regulations.name: Belgium: outdoor
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport.

local_regulations.name: Belgium: outdoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport and keep a 1,5m distance with others on the outdoors. You can sit with 7 other people at cafés.

local_regulations.name: Belgium: indoor
local_regulations.conditions: Indoors: You have to wear a facemask at indoor activities open to the public.

local_regulations.name: Belgium: indoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Indoors: You have to wear a facemask at indoor activities open to the public and keep a 1.5m distance with others. You can sit with 7 other people at cafés.

local_regulations.name: Luxembourg: outdoor
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport.

local_regulations.name: Luxembourg: outdoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport and if you are in a gathering of more than 10 people. In the last case, you have to keep a 2m distance with others. You can sit with 9 other people outside cafés and restaurants without CovidCheck system.

local_regulations.name: Luxembourg: indoor
local_regulations.conditions: Indoors: You have to wear a facemask at indoor activities open to the public.

local_regulations.name: Luxembourg: indoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Indoors: You have to wear a facemask at indoor activities open to the public and if you are in a gathering of more than 10 people. In the last case, you have to keep a 2m distance with others.  You can sit with 3 other people inside cafés and restaurants without CovidCheck system.

local_regulations.name: Netherlands: outdoor
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport, at stations and airports.

local_regulations.name: Netherlands: outdoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Outdoors: You have to wear a mask on public transport, at stations and airports and keep a 1,5m distance with others on the outdoors.

local_regulations.name: Netherlands: indoor AND different_household
local_regulations.conditions: Indoors: You should keep a 1,5m distance in the buildings with others.

local_regulations.name: Belgium: open places
local_regulations.conditions: Non-essential shops are open. Hotels, cafés and restaurants are open with sanitary rules applicable inside. All cultural establishments are open.

local_regulations.name: Luxembourg: open places
local_regulations.conditions: Non-essential shops are open. Hotels, cafés and restaurants are open; however, sanitary rules apply inside places without CovidCheck system. All cultural establishments are open.

local_regulations.name: Netherlands: open places
local_regulations.conditions: Non-essential shops are open. Hotels, cafés and restaurants are open; however, registration and a health check are mandatory. All cultural establishments are open.
